Name: THE SOUL HUNTER
About the game: I'm a hunter, a soul hunter. It sounds a little weird. There aren't many people like us. Nobody knows we exist, but we do. One of the news I've seen these days is that a house in a small town is so weird that five families have moved out for special reasons. They say they've had a weird event, but nobody believes it. I decided to investigate, hoping to gain some results. This is a game of survival decryption. Game Tips: 1. Salt props can attack ghosts. 2. The cabinet can avoid the attack of ghosts. 3. Electromagnetic waves can perceive the distance from ghosts. 4. Turn over the cabinet to find more salt and flashlight batteries. Come and explore the mystery.
